title: The Detox Box
description: Have you tried The Detox Box? Your comments will help others looking for solution. Shout about The Detox Box and educate the world on your real experiences. We can rant and rave about how good it is until we are...
cleaned_text: Have you tried [ The Detox Box](http://hightechhealth.com.au/Default.aspx?tabid=54)? Your comments will help others looking for solution. Shout about The Detox Box and educate the world on your real experiences. We can rant and rave about how good it is until we are blue in the face (but so can everyone else who copies The Detox Box). What do you want to see? What can we improve or stop doing? Do
